|travis| |appveyor|

cpuid
=====

cpuid Pythonic API

Getting started 
---------------

Stable version:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install --upgrade cpuid

Development version:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install --upgrade --index-url https://test.pypi.org/pypi/ cpuid
